newsitem.title: USA: U.S. barge rates steady to lower on call session.
newsitem.headline: U.S. barge rates steady to lower on call session.

text.p: U.S. barge rates were mostly steady to lower Thursday on St. Louis Merchants Exchange call session. Seven barges traded Thursday versus none Wednesday.
- Two barges, next week, Mississippi (St Paul-Savage) bid 125 percent of tariff, trade.
- Five barges, one each week of December, Illinois River, bid 170 percent, trade.
- Two barges, next week, Mid-Mississippi, no bid, offered 105 percent, down 2-1/2 percentage points.
- Two barges, next week, Illinois, no bid, offered 95 percent.
- Eight barges, two each week of October, Mid-Mississippi, bid 215 percent, offer 220 percent.
- Eight barges, two each week of October, Illinois, no bid, offered 220 percent.
